args:
While Mym proceeds with her daily confession
of love, she senses a powerful source of mana
and leads everyone to a ruined village. The
responsible party is the lonely flame dragon,
Prometheus. He is brought back to the castle,
but can he ever be truly tamed?
Hello, darling. I'm sorry for calling\nyou here so suddenly.
I surprised you, didn't I?\n...Hmm? Wait, I didn't?
...Because I call for you every day?\nAh, yes. I see.
And yet, would a confession not feel \nhollow without such formalities?
I am simply overflowing with love for you!
That is why I must summon you forth\nevery day and tell you how I feel!
And as this IS Valentine's, let us spend\nsome time together deepening our love.
And then...you can swear your love to me!
And we'll seal it with a ki—\n...Hmm? What is... *sniff*

I'm detecting an extraordinary source
of mana from somewhere nearby!
Something this strong could only be
coming from another dragon.
My confession of love will simply have\nto wait...until tomorrow.
This village has been ravaged!\nWhat happened here?
No, ma'am. We WERE attacked by fiends,\nbut they're not the ones responsible for\nthe current state of things.
Out with it already, man!\nWhat happened?!
When we were attacked by fiends,\nwe were saved by a dragon.
It was incredibly strong, and scattered\nthe fiends with ease. However, it may\nhave actually been TOO strong.
It did a number on our village,\nsame as it did to the fiends.
I couldn't say. By the time I came out\nof hiding, it had already gone.
I'm sure this dragon is the possessor\nof the fearsome mana I sensed earlier.
It destroyed the village at the same time\nit was trying to save it.

I know not what its true purpose is,
but I know for certain it possesses
a strength the likes of which we
have rarely encountered before.
We cannot simply hope this sorts itself\nout on its own; we must find this dragon!
Okay. So where do we look?
If I follow the traces of its mana...\nAh! There it is. This way!
I am Prometheus the mighty.\nAnd who are YOU?!
We govern over this region, and...
Ah, but you have a most terrible wound.\nIntroductions can wait; I must treat that\nat once before it can fester.
It has naught to do with you. Begone!
Stop being stubborn and follow us\nto the Halidom at once, dragon!
The castle home of His Highness.

So you are ＂His Highness,＂ are you?
I'm surprised such a frail-looking human
could be the lord of anything, much less
a castle. Are you certain it still stands?
How dare you speak that way\nabout my darling!
Hmm... I can sense that you are a dragon.\nWhy do you take another form?
So my darling and I may love each other!
Do you speak of this frail human here?
You would love such a pathetic creature?\nAaaah ha ha ha! Such japes!
You have nerve indeed to laugh at me!
Come, darling. Let us leave this\nabsurd creature behind to rot.
...You refuse? Ugh, you are SO kind!\nAlthough I must admit I find that trait\nto be so very attractive.
I'd like to get Prometheus treated soon,\nso if we can hurry this up?
All right, buddy. Looks like yer comin'\nwith us whether ya like it or not.
Gya! Stop this at once!\nNo one yanks a dragon along!

Do not blame me for whatever
happens if you feeble humans
insist on involving yourselves
with the dealings of dragonkind!
You're a real handful, you know that?
Normally humans and dragons alike just\nfall into your arms, darling, but it seems\nthis one is going to take some persuading.
But I know you won't give up!
Still, if there is anything I can do to help,\nyou have but to ask!
